full_summary:
================
### Lawn and Landscape Maintenance Contract at Fortifications of Québec National Historic Site

**Solicitation Reference:** 5P300-23-0226/A
**Publication Date:** 2024-01-04
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-31T14:00:00

**Contract Period:** April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2027 (with option to extend)

**Details:**

* Contract scope: To provide lawn and landscape maintenance services for the Fortifications of Québec National Historic Site, covering approximately 30,000 square meters of grassed areas.
* Services to include: spring clean-up, lawn mowing and trimming, lawn aeration, leaf removal, and mowing of overgrown areas.
* Bidders are expected to be familiar with the National Park Act and other relevant regulations.

**Site Visit:**
A site visit is recommended for interested bidders. The visit will take place on January 18, 2024, at 2 rue d'Auteuil, Québec, QC G1R 5C2. Bidders must confirm their attendance with Helene Periard (helene.periard@pc.gc.ca) by January 17, 2024.

**Bidding Guidelines:**

* Bidders must submit their proposals via fax or email as indicated in the solicitation document.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring their proposal is received by Parks Canada on or before the tender closing date.
* Email files must be no larger than 15 megabytes.

**Enquiries:**
All enquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted in writing and received no later than five calendar days prior to the tender closing date.

**Notice:**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Associated Documents:**

* Appendices I and II
* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Amendment 1
* Specification documents

Bidders must obtain the solicitation documents from the Government of Canada's tendering service website: [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). Late submissions will not be considered. ิต tộiesco
